title: Interview Practice
goal: Conduct a full interview using all question types.

sections.content:
Warm-up (2-3 min)

All 8 vocabulary words:

motive → ?     make happen → ?
cause → ?      do/act → ?
result → ?     try → ?
reason → ?     succeed → ?

(Answers: mukti, gasnu, rinka, zukte, jalge, troci, krinu, snada)

Grammar Summary (3-4 min)

Question Words

Cmavo Asks about Example
xu Yes/no xu do klama
ma Sumti (who/what) do klama ma
mo Selbri (what is/does) do mo
xo Number (how many) xo gerku

Week 17 Vocabulary

Lojban English Lojban English
mukti motive gasnu make happen
rinka cause zukte do
jalge result troci try
krinu reason snada succeed

Self-Test (5-6 min)

Part A: Vocabulary (8 points)

Translate:

  1. mukti →
  2. rinka →
  3. zukte →
  4. snada →

Translate to Lojban:

  1. result →
  2. reason →
  3. try →
  4. make happen →
Answers
  1. motive
  2. cause
  3. do/act
  4. succeed
  5. jalge
  6. krinu
  7. troci
  8. gasnu

Part B: Questions (8 points)

What does each question ask?

  1. do klama ma →
  2. do mo →
  3. xo cukta →
  4. xu do gleki →

Form questions:

  1. Who goes? → ?
  2. What is this? → ?
  3. How many dogs? → ?
  4. Do you work? → ?
Answers
  1. Where do you go?
  2. What are you / what are you doing?
  3. How many books?
  4. Are you happy?
  5. ma klama
  6. ti mo
  7. xo gerku
  8. xu do gunka

Part C: Interview (4 points)

Translate:

  1. What are you doing?
  2. What causes you to be happy?
  3. What do you try to do?
  4. Do you succeed?
Answers
  1. do mo or do zukte ma
  2. ma rinka lo nu do gleki
  3. do troci lo nu ma
  4. xu do snada

Integration Challenge (1-2 min)

Conduct an Interview

Ask and answer at least:

  • Two ma questions
  • One mo question
  • One xo question
  • One cause question

Example:

do mo
.i mi gunka
.i do gunka ma
.i mi gunka lo jbobau
.i ma mukti
.i mi djica lo nu jimpe
.i xu do snada
.i mi troci .i mi baco'a snada

(What are you doing? I'm working. What do you work on? I work on Lojban. What is your motive? I want to understand. Do you succeed? I try. I will start to succeed.)

Create your own interview and say it aloud.

Week 17 Complete Reference

Vocabulary (8):

Lojban English Lojban English
mukti motive gasnu make happen
rinka cause zukte do
jalge result troci try
krinu reason snada succeed

Question Words:

Cmavo Asks about
xu Yes/no
ma Sumti
mo Selbri
xo Number

Cumulative vocabulary: ~148 words

Summary

You completed Week 17 on questions. You can now ask about actions, causes, quantities, and states using xu, ma, mo, and xo.

Next week preview: Week 18 introduces attitudinals and evidentials.
